name: Pokemon Winterthur Edition
description:
This is a Pokemon fangame based on the city of Winterthur.

You follow the story of the protagonist trying to become the champion of the Winterthurer region. On this way he'll have to face many challenges. Find out for yourself ;).

This game was made with RPG Maker xp and Pokémon Workshop.

This is a fangame and I do not owe any rights of the used graphics.
